cards.monitor: Monitor and report on the outcomes

textfield.title: Please provide a title for your report
textfield.location_expl: In which of the following geographical locations will the project be implemented
textfield.target_beneficiaries: Please indicate how many people your project aimed to reach
textfield.total_commited: Please indicate how many people benefited from your project in total
textfield.of_which_ben: Which target group(s) did your project help? Choose multiple if applicable.
textfield.sdg_mapping_expl: For each priority selected, the relevant SDGs appear and can beselected based on our mapping
textfield.percentage_expl: The sum of selected fields must be equal to 100%
textfield.target_group_sdg_expl: NOTE: Please select “Reduced inequalities” in the SDGs dropdown selection above. If your project targeted women & girls, please also select “Gender equality” as SDG

cards.key_outcomes: Please describe the key outcomes the project aimed to achieve
cards.monitor: Please tell us how you monitored the outcomes listed above
cards.monitor_expl:
For example: a) Increase in prostitutes that use bank accounts and credit cards and can sustain a permanent residence. b) Frequency of health and social support visits increased, preventive medical assistance enhanced and beneficiaries reporting improved health. c) Number of prisoners obtaining a Tertiary and Vocational Education certificate, labor market connection after one year after the release from prison.
If you have baseline data (the data you track progress against) and a means of verification (how you intend to obtain the data and from which sources) please also provide that information.
cards.inputs_invested: What inputs were invested into the project?
cards.inputs_invested_expl: Think of number of volunteers / people hired, equipment, services etc
cards.activities_undertaken: What activities have you undertaken to complete the project?
cards.projectgoals_socialbenefits: What projectgoal(s) and wider social benefits (if applicable) have you achieved?
cards.important_factors: What were the most important factors that enabled you to achieve your project goal(s)? (Please list in order of importance.)
cards.orgs_partners: Which organisations did you receive funding from, aside from Insinger? Which partners did you work with, if any?
cards.key_implementation_challenges: What were the key challenges you experienced during the project?
cards.key_implementation_challenges_expl: Please indicate the key implementation challenges experience and how these were addressed
cards.how_address_challenges: How did you address these challenges?
cards.other_project: Did the project achieve any other unexpected (positive or negative) outcomes
cards.other_project_expl: Did the project achieve any other unexpected (positive or negative) outcomes
cards.future_plans_expl: Are you likely to apply for funding for future activities from the Insinger Foundation within the next 1-2 years?
cards.how_important_insinger_support: Overall, how important would you say Insinger Foundation support has been for your project?
cards.apply_for_more_funding: Are you likely to apply for funding for future activities from the Insinger Foundation within the next 1-2 years?
cards.other_comments_expl: Please let us know if you want to share other observations or comments with the Insinger Foundation
